title: Client Error when i press play?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: i just downloaded the new patch and when i tried launching my client it showed me this error message? i have never seen this error message before and am attempting to repair my client now. any thoughts on what has caused this? was it the patch?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), let me know if this helps out.

hey, client works now after the repair. still would like to know what caused this exactly because it has never happened before and would like to prevent it.

- Sorry for the late reply

More than likely a corrupted file from patching, this could be caused when the patcher has issues retrieving a specific file (as in, it half downloads something and assumes it's finished, usually caused by an intermittent network connection while patching)
